name: fantastic dogs pictures for kids - free
name_original: fantastic dogs pictures for kids - free
description:
This game is made especially for children. The difficulty and its graphics are suitable for a young audience (under 8). This application is composed of two different games:

first game:
This is a shooter designed specifically for younger children. To complete a level, you must hit a number of targets. Every time your child completes a level he earns a dog image. It can free up to 20 pictures of dogs available in the collection.

second game:
In this game, different objects appear on a treadmill. To win you must remove unnecessary objects. Only the requested objects should fall into the basket at the end of the treadmill. Every time your child completes a level he earns a dog image. It can free up to 20 pictures of dogs available in the collection.

Characteristics :
- Gameplay adapted to children.
- World fit for children.
- Three difficulty levels.
- Simple interface suitable for children.
- 2 different games available.
- 2 possible players on one device.
- 40 images of dogs to release.

the following languages ​​are available:
Albanian, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malay, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovene, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.
